Name: Nicky Finn
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Basically, a Sidecar spiked with an aniseedy dash of anis liqueur.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Cocktail: The Drink's Bible for the 21st Century by Paul Harrington and Laura Moorhead.
Nutrition: One serving of Nicky Finn contains 163 calories
